DOC.detailed_description: During first phase study ( Days 1-6 ) , safety tolerability multiple dos ADF assess administer simultaneously patient 's reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( RTI ) regimen . The second phase begin Day 7 nelfinavir add therapy regimen additional 15 week . ADF pharmacokinetics measure Days 1 , 2 , 7 ( subset 18 patient ) ; peak trough sample collect Day 28 .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Your child may eligible study he/she : Is 3 month 16 year old . Is HIVpositive . Has never take protease inhibitor previously take ritonavir ( RTV ) , saquinavir ( SQV ) , indinavir ( IDV ) willing stop medication study entry . Is take antiHIV drug combination change least 2 week prior study entry . Agrees use effective barrier method birth control , condom , study . Has consent parent guardian . Exclusion Criteria Your child eligible study he/she : Has ever take NFV . Has history opportunistic ( AIDSrelated ) infection . Has disease illness would prevent him/her complete study , include cancer . Has take certain medication , include protease inhibitor study entry . Is receive HIV vaccine study entry . Is pregnant .
